title: Did James Clapper ‘Out’ Barack Obama as the ‘Mastermind’ Behind the ‘Russia Hoax’?
subtitle: A CNN interview video was miscaptioned to suggest the Obama administration's involvement in a Trumpian controversy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Former U.S. Director of National Intelligence James Clapper "outed" President Barack Obama as the "mastermind" behind the "Russia hoax."
